ingredients.item: 2 x Waitrose Organic British Sirloin Steaks
½ x 250g pack organic chestnut mushrooms, sliced
½ x 250g pack organic Portabellini mushrooms, peeled and sliced
½ x 300g pot Joubère Organic Beef Stock
½ x 227ml pot Yeo Valley Organic Double Cream
½ x 20g pack fresh organic curly parsley, chopped

instructions.step: Heat the butter and oil in a large frying pan and cook the steaks for 2-3 minutes on each side (rare), 4 minutes on each side (medium) or 6 minutes on each side (well done). Place on serving plates and cover with foil to keep warm.  Reduce the heat, add the garlic and mushrooms to the pan, and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally.  Pour over the stock and leave to bubble for 2 minutes, until it has reduced slightly. Stir in the cream and heat until it bubbles. Add the parsley to the sauce and season to taste.  Pour some of the sauce over the steaks and serve with organic new potatoes and fresh green organic beans. Any additional sauce can be served separately.
